Fault.name: bpel/UploadPayment.bpel
Fault.fix: You have stumbled onto a BPEL 2.0 validator bug. Please send us a test case to fix this problem.
Fault.msg: Validator error on <bpel:copy> while running rule "CopyValidator.CheckCompatibleCopy.40" - exception "java.lang.ClassCastException: oracle.xml.parser.schema.XSDComplexType cannot be cast to oracle.xml.parser.schema.XSDSimpleType" near (OracleModelQueryImpl.java:1287).

Fault.name: bpel/UploadPayment.bpel
